item.title: Data Wrangling and Model Fitting using purrr
item.description: What is purrr? The Basics of purrr Key purrr verbs Multiple lists using pmap Wrangling lists Analysis with purrr and modelr Parallel purrr Miscellaneos purrr Debugging using safely Find and Convert Factors Print All Plots to PDF Partial These are materials from a workshop I taught for UC Santa Barbaraâ€™s eco-data-science group to get people familiar with using purrr for their data-wrangling and modeling needs.
